title: Rageblade fervor Rakan
body: Fully stacked for both of them and they don't do apply any onhit at all or even twice.

replies.body: Fervor was changed at the start of the season to give bonus AD instead of on-hit damage...

Ah, Thanks didn't know they changed it to that, but still the {{item:3124}}  isn't procing it's every other attack with other on hit items like {{item:3153}} , the purple clone isn't there, instead sometimes I just get like a bigger text of the same dmg but with an extra 7 ap dmg like every 10 autos or something.
